attributes.action: Force car insurance companies to provide fair prices for younger people.
attributes.additional_details: For a first year driver on a car under £1500 value it majority costs over £1200 to insure. This can be hard to achieve for students who pay for education as well as young people who support their families with low income.
attributes.background: In an already challenging economy for younger people with student debts and increasing housing prices affording a car can be extremely hard. A lot of students use cars to get to and from their education as well as part time jobs etc.
